properties.name: opened
properties.description: Responsible on open status of Collapser component

properties.name: iconColor
properties.description: Set icon color of Collapser component on header

properties.name: bodySlotName
properties.description: Responsible the presentation of header slot, won't need to be provided in case if headerSlotName isn't using inside the component

properties.name: headerSlotName
properties.description: Responsible the presentation of header slot, when the header slot passed the next props won't be using 'label', 'titleAlignment', 'iconColorWrapper'

properties.name: statusData
properties.description: Represent object that contains data for displaying validation status

events.name: update:opened
events.description: Event emitted on click on collapser component, with changed value to opposite
